item.title: Tree is damaged problem, 14th April
item.description:
FMS forwarded by CBC as land not owned by them - Overhanging tree branches falling. Trees and bushes beside and behind number 49 beaufort road GL52 6JS need to be cut back as branches are falling into garden and on roof and becoming very dangerous if they are to hit someone and cause damage to property. (see attached email trail)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Trees fallen over Foot Path, 14th April
item.description:
On footpath running alongside Chase Avenue towards Ham. A couple of trees are leaning over and likely to block the footpath.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 335, London Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tree is damaged problem, 14th April
item.description:
FMS report fwd by CBC as 'not their tree ' - Moderate size branch broken and hanging above parking bay. Silver birch tree on the pavement outside 36 Kings Road, Cheltenham, GL52 6BG Noticed over the weekend 6th April
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tree planted too close to our garden wall now causing damage to wall, 14th April
item.description:
On Footpath from London Road towards Ham alongside of 364 London Road. Issue was reported to local Councillor at start of March after issue was raised here in February and closed with no action on this website - need to know how to raise this issue further as no action has been proposed by Highways and problem has not been addressed.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 335, London Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: I have reported this before, 14th April
item.description:
I have reported this before there are far too many potholes to mention they are all over Salamanca Road, you are zig zagging to avoid them the whole road, and they are getting bigger and more of them it is a complete mess trying to drive here especially with all the parked cars to avoid, you told me they did not need doing so I ask you to please take another look
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 28, Salamanca Road, Oakley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
